hero.heading: HI, I'M LUCAS WELTER!
hero.intro: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from UFMS, driven by technology and focused on developing innovative and impactful solutions.

aboutSection.heading: About Me
aboutSection.description: Enthusiast of new technologies and complex challenges, with experience in developing robust and scalable applications, guided by curiosity and a focus on efficient solutions.

content.text: Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul - Bachelor in Software Engineering (2020–2023)

service1.title: Mobile Applications
service1.description: Development of modern mobile applications with high performance and cross-platform compatibility, delivering exceptional user experiences.

service2.title: Web Development
service2.description: Creation of tailored web solutions, from professional websites to robust systems, always prioritizing responsive design, functionality, and high performance.

service3.title: Software Hosting
service3.description: Comprehensive managed hosting service, ensuring your software is always available, secure, and running optimally.

project1.title: React Portfolio Website
project1.description: A responsive React portfolio with interactive features.

project2.title: Photography Portfolio Website
project2.description: A visually appealing website for photographers.

project3.title: E-commerce Application
project3.description: A scalable e-commerce solution with modern UI.

project4.title: Food Ordering Application
project4.description: A mobile app for seamless food ordering experience.

project6.title: Full-stack Roadmap
project6.description: A guide to mastering full-stack development.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer (Contractor)
description: Defined product discovery requirements, worked as a developer, and served as Scrum Master.
Developed and implemented the front-end and back-end of a camera monitoring system with AI, designed for primary healthcare units.
Worked with TypeScript, Node.js, Vue.js, Fastify, Prisma, and Docker to deliver a robust and scalable solution.

experiences.title: Mobile Developer
description: Responsible for developing mobile applications using Flutter.
Led new trainees in adopting agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban, as well as in using Git and branching models.

experiences.title: Member of the Public Bidding Department
description: Participated in the creation and execution of public bidding processes.
Introduced the Trello platform to improve process management.
Generated reports and economic charts for analyzing each type of bidding process.

emailSection.heading: Let's Connect!
emailSection.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and would love to hear from you. My inbox is always open! Whether you have a question, want to share ideas, or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to reply as soon as possible.
